entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries over northern sections. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southwest 40 gusting to 60 over southern sections this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over southern sections this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
